channel.title: Android on DSkrzypiec Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Android on DSkrzypiec Blog

item.title: Writing a blog on smartphone
item.description: Intro Nowadays smartphones are basically a pocket computers. Smartphone hardware evolution is very rapid. I was in a situation where my middle-tier phone was better than my current laptop. Could smartphone be used for programming in that case? The answer is yes but is it actual feasible? In this post we’ll focus on implementing a blog on a Android smartphone. I’ve been using my smartphone to play with C++, Go, Vim and practice UNIX programs like AWK and grep for quite some time now.
